text: Leonid Grcev Leonid Grcev is an electrical engineer at Sts. Cyril and Methodius University in Skopje, Macedonia. Grcev was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for his contributions to transient electromagnetic modeling of grounding systems. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Macedonian engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Leonid Grcev
